articles.author: Kate Nicholson
articles.title: Prince William admitted Kate struggles with Granny Diana talk: ‘She didn’t know her’ - Express
articles.description: PRINCE WILLIAM admitted his wife Kate Middleton struggles to discuss her late mother-in-law, Princess Diana, with her children because the Duchess never met her.
